mapper.select: SELECT a.id id, a.title title, a.address address, a.organizer organizer, a.status status, date_format(a.start_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') startTime, date_format(a.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') endTime, date_format(a.gmt_create, '%Y-%m-%d %T') gmtCreate, date_format(a.gmt_modified, '%Y-%m-%d %T') gmtModified FROM tb_activity a WHERE a.deleted = '0' ORDER BY a.id ASC LIMIT #{offSet}, #{pageRow}
